message: Who are the designers around HN?
have you tried 99designs?
http://searchyc.com/ turned up this: http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=1507468
Been looking for a UI designer for our startup, not really getting anywhere
Any designers on HN? Or we're just a bunch of code monkeys
yes i know of 99designs but we need someone to work on a number of projects not just a landing page
I wonder where all the yc startups get their design done..
I am also looking for an iphone designer... anyone has experience?
theres a few of us around, check out my portfolio at http://kiwigrove.com
@khangtoh I'm not looking for work, but might be able to send you in the right direction
@khangtoh What alexbaldwin said. :)
this http://www.softfacade.com/ russian company did great work on  http://www.stickybits.com/
@JAnderson been doing HTML for a decade and CSS/JS for the last few years. love designing in rails, but can barely do more than make arrays in ruby
@micrypt digging your site, looks great
@JAnderson there's not that many out there. most CS departments couldn't care less about the web
@alexbaldwin if i may ask what is your technical background
Anyone have any ideas on how to get student web developers to get involved on a project
these days softfacade's stuff can be picked out of a lineup in seconds (their style rarely changes very much). I do love their icons, then again I am an icon nerd.

@alexbaldwin thats what I figured, I've been trying to contact different schools within the university with no luck... Ive started the project myself but im still learning so theres only so much I can do
@JAnderson you're going to be better off hiring someone
@alexbaldwin Thanks. I need to work on my writing though. :P
@bradendouglass There's another Eastern European firm with a very very similar style. The name escapes me right now though.
I'm one http://dribbble.com/pekpongpaet
@pekpongpaet You blog says you do martial arts. Which one(s)? :)
Ah, found the "about me" page.
@pekpongpaet ShelfLuv looks awesome. Love to talk to you more about our projects. Shoot me an email! khang.toh@gmail.com thx!
@petar yeah.. we talked to them and they are really the premium of what you find for UI design.
@alexbaldwin shoot me an email khang.toh@gmail.com
To find a designer, you gotta look at portfolios. Coroflot.com is a good place.

Not to group name drop, but I'm trying to put together a Convore group where developers/designers can meet founders and others to facilitate partnerships/work. If we can get enough ppl it might help ease the search. https://convore.com/the-lounge/
@khangtoh sorry for the late reply. I havent played around much w/ convore and have been ignoring most of the notification emails.
@micrypt i've been practicing wushu for over 12 years. My claim to fame is that I've done the motion capture for 6 Mortal Kombat video games

Hey, I am a UI/ Graphic Designer ready to contribute to startup. Also, if you would like a free week of my work for your startup you can see http://www.thestartupfix.com - I'm also available for more serious work if u guys want to talk. :)
